text: Boglar Shamans are often gifted Moor Hounds by the Fimir. Such gifts can serve as either reward or punishment - if the Hound devours the Shaman, it was a punishment; if the Shaman tames it, a reward.
The highest-ranking nobles often ride into battle atop mighty Bog Beasts.

Whether it is the genuine article or a replica made for her is unknown, but Skattach claims it to be the original throne of the mythical Hell-Mother, ruler of all Fimir. It is borne aloft by four of Skattachâ€™s most trusted Fianna Guardians.
